citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the facility did not have a documented environmental enhancement plan for avian species. This
plan is required to promote psychological well-being of the avian species at the facility.
The facility must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for environmental enhancement adequate to
promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and, at a
minimum, must address social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint, and exemptions to
the plan.
TO BE CORRECTED BY SEPTEMBER 30, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative and the licensee.
n

The facility must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for environmental enhancement adequate to

minimum, must address social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint, and exemptions to
